column30: Any additional comments regarding your experience?
The exhibit pulls you in once you connect with it and spend time getting to know it.  It isn't an immediate feedback.
column31: The exhibit could be improved by a faster reactive time but the room was empty and it would be more interactive with more people interacting with it.  I really wanted to see the liquid move in the short time I had to interact.  Visual feedback is more satisfying than just sound or quiet motion.

column30: The technical components of the display were less responsive to people and seemed to be on a sort of timed cycle, more variety in responses would be really cool.
A little bit creepy, especially the insect-like parts.
column31: Very interesting in purpose, but I think it could have been more interactive! Things seemed to move randomly, rather than in motion with me.
